short_summary: Automotive Engine Repair Services for the Canadian Forces Base Newfoundland (CFB Newfoundland)
description: Vehicle maintenance and repair services including repairs to automotive engines.
full_summary:
**Title**
Automotive Engine Repair Services for CFB Trenton

**Reference Number**
WS4074909462

**(amendment)** 
First Amendment.

**Notice Period Begins**
August 1, 2023

**Last Date to Submit Offer**
August 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM.

**Contract Duration**
2023-2026.

**Tender Status**
Expired

**Services Required**
Vehicle Maintenance and Repair Services (UNSPSC 78181500)

**Number of Tender**
One.

**Method of Procurement**
Competitive (Open Bidding)

**Provision of Service**
This contract follows a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) procedure.

**Location of Work**
Quinte West, Ontario, Canada.

**Procurement Address**
The procuring authority is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Contracting Entity Contact**
Name: Denton, Crystal
Contact eMail: [crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
